tsss = copy.deepcopy(self.example.tsss)
trans = copy.deepcopy(self.example.tas)
stc.assign_tss(tsss[0], trans[0])
self.assertDictEqual(tsss[0].attributes, {'utr_length': 'Primary_25', 'ID':
    'tss3', 'Name': 'TSS:2131_f', 'libs':
    'TSB_OD_0.2,TSB_OD_0.5,TSB_t0,pMEM_OD_0.2,pMEM_OD_0.5,pMEM_t2',
    'associated_gene': 'SAOUHSC_00002', 'Parent': 'tran0', 'type': 'Primary'})
self.assertDictEqual(trans[0].attributes, {'type': 'cover_CDS,cover_CDS',
    'Name': 'Transcript_00000', 'associated_cds': 'YP_498609.1,YP_498610.1',
    'associated_tss':
    'TSS:313_+,TSS:1641_+,TSS:2128_+,TSS:2131_+,TSS:2131_f', 'ID': 'tran0'})
